lead_paragraph: CHERVENAK--Jody M.,died on June 17, 2016. Funeral Mass at Our Lady Of Sorrows Church, 217 Prospect St., South Orange, NJ on June 20th at 10:30am. Interment Holy Sepulchre Cemetery, East Orange, NJ. Visitation will be held at Preston Funeral Home, 153 South Orange Ave, South Orange, NJ on Sunday, 3:00-5:00pm. She was predeceased by her husband Francis Chervenak. She is survived by her children Frank Chervenak M.D., Donald Chervenak M.D., Judi Lee Chervenak M.D., grandchildren Frank A., Joey J., Donald Chervenak, Steven T. and Francesca M. Beldner, and her sister Johanna M. Longo. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CHERVENAK, JODY M.
